mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visit (pet_id, visit_date, hospital, doctor, diagnosis, notes, total_cost) VALUES (#{petId}, #{visitDate}, #{hospital}, #{doctor}, #{diagnosis}, #{notes}, #{totalCost})
mapper.update: UPDATE visit SET visit_date = #{visitDate}, hospital = #{hospital}, doctor = #{doctor}, diagnosis = #{diagnosis}, notes = #{notes}, total_cost = #{totalCost} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM visit WHERE pet_id = #{petId} ORDER BY visit_date DESC
